text: 12.7 Hos 6.6, Mat 9.13 Pen takaw olap buk Baybol kɨl tɨkɨlak ak, nɨgtep ma gɨpɨm tek lup agak. Takaw anɨb ak tɨkɨl agɨlak, God ne agup, Yɨp tap sɨbog ñɨnɨmɨb agɨl gos ma nepin agup agɨl tɨkɨlak agak. Binɨb okok kɨlop mapen nɨgɨnɨmɨb agɨl gos nepin agup agɨl tɨkɨlak agak. Takaw anɨb ak nɨgtep gɨpɨkep ak, bɨ gɨtep gɨpal okok kɨlop gos tɨmel nɨŋɨd ma ag gɨpɨkep agak.
